sentences.sContent: He sprawled out on the sofa.
sentences.sCn: 他摊开手脚躺在沙发上。

sentences.sContent: I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
sentences.sCn: 我被一块石头绊了一下，四仰八叉地摔在人行道上。

sentences.sContent: a blow which sent him sprawling
sentences.sCn: 打得他四脚朝天的一拳

synos.tran: 蔓延；伸开手足躺；无计划地扩展
蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势

phrases.pCn: 城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象

trans.tranCn: 散乱地延伸； 四肢摊开着坐、 卧或倒下
trans.tranOther: to lie or sit with your arms or legs stretched out in a lazy or careless way
